Text.Page:
, the most powerful minion of the first Gods have broke through the wall.

You must stop it before the world is destroyed.
The fate of both our realms is in your hands.

Defeat the Underworld Devil and retrieve its mana to hlp restore the wall.

I sense great power from you.

On behalf of Agaia, I thank you.
If the wall breaks down, both your world and this one are doomed.
